Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Addison.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
